00003 /*! \mainpage PPIDD Reference Manual
00004  *
00005  * Parallel Programming Interface for Distributed Data (PPIDD) Reference
00006  * Manual. The Fortran interface subroutine descriptions can be found
00007  * in ppidd_fortran.c.
00008   
00009 //   Directory and file structure in PPIDD:
00010   <pre>
00011 
00012        .                                  PPIDD root directory
00013        |-- GNUmakefile                    Makefile to build PPIDD
00014        |-- README                         README for PPIDD
00015        |-- VERSION                        VERSION number for PPIDD
00016        |-- ./doc                          Document directory
00017        |   `-- Doxyfile                       Document configuration file
00018        |-- ./lib                          Final location of PPIDD library
00019        |-- ./src                          Source code directory for PPIDD library  
00020        |   |-- GNUmakefile                    Makefile for src directory
00021        |   |-- machines.h                     Head file for machine-related settings
00022        |   |-- mpi_helpmutex.c                Mutex source file using helper process
00023        |   |-- mpi_nxtval.c                   NXTVAL source file 
00024        |   |-- mpi_nxtval.h                   NXTVAL header file
00025        |   |-- mpi_utils.c                    MPI utility source file 
00026        |   |-- mpi_utils.h                    MPI utility header file
00027        |   |-- mpiga_base.c                   Source code for distributed data structure 
00028        |   |-- mpiga_base.h                   Head file for distributed data structure
00029        |   |-- mpimutex-hybrid.c              Mutex source file using distributed processes
00030        |   |-- mpimutex.h                     Mutex header file using distributed processes
00031        |   |-- ppidd_c.c                      C interface source code 
00032        |   |-- ppidd_c.h                      C interface header file
00033        |   |-- ppidd_doxygen.h                PPIDD document main page file
00034        |   |-- ppidd_dtype.h                  PPIDD data type header file
00035        |   |-- ppidd_eaf_c.c                  C interface source code for EAF
00036        |   |-- ppidd_eaf_c.h                  C interface header file for EAF
00037        |   |-- ppidd_eaf_fortran.c            Fortran interface source code for EAF
00038        |   |-- ppidd_eaf_fortran.h            Fortran interface header file for EAF
00039        |   |-- ppidd_fortran.c                Fortran interface source code for PPIDD
00040        |   |-- ppidd_fortran.h                Fortran interface header file for PPIDD
00041        |   |-- ppidd_sf_c.c                   C interface source code for SF
00042        |   |-- ppidd_sf_c.h                   C interface header file for SF
00043        |   |-- ppidd_sf_fortran.c             Fortran interface source code for SF
00044        |   |-- ppidd_sf_fortran.h             Fortran interface header file for SF
00045        |   `-- ppidd_undefdtype.h             Fortran data type header file for C interface
00046        `-- ./test                         Test code directory for PPIDD library
00047            |-- GNUmakefile                    Makefile for test directory
00048            |-- ppidd_ctest.c                  C test program
00049            |-- ppidd_test.F                   Fortran test program
00050            |-- sizeofctypes.c                 Code for determining the size of C data types
00051            |-- sizeoffortypes.F               Code for determining the size of Fortran data types
00052            |-- ppidd_test.F                   Fortran test program
00053            `-- timing_molpro.c                Utility tool for timing                         
00054  
00055   </pre>
00056 
00057 //   Some examples of building the PPIDD library:
00058  *    The following examples are tested on a x86_64//Linux machine on which Intel Fortran and C compilers,
00059  *    MPI2-aware Intel Fortran and C compilers, and Intel MPI library are available. 
00060  *    Please be aware the options might be different on other machines.
00061   <pre>
00062 
00063      1. Build MPI-2 version of PPIDD:
00064      make MPICC=mpiicc MPIFC=mpiifort INT64=y FFLAGS='-i8'
00065 
00066      or
00067      make CC=icc FC=ifort INT64=y FFLAGS='-i8' INCLUDE=/software/intel/mpi/3.1/include64 \
00068      MPILIB='-L/software/intel/mpi/3.1/lib64 -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker $libdir -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /opt/intel/mpi-rt/3.1 -lmpi -lmpiif -lmpigi -lrt -lpthread -ldl -L/usr/lib64 -libverbs -lm'     
00069      (the front part for MPILIB option comes from `mpiifort -show`, and the rear part '-L/usr/lib64 -libverbs -lm' is used to link with Infiniband network.)
00070 
00071      2. Build Global Arrays version of PPIDD.
00072      Global Arrays should be installed prior to building PPIDD. As mentioned in Global Arrays documentation(http://www.emsl.pnl.gov/docs/global), 
00073      there are three possible ways for building GA: (1) GA with MPI; (2) GA with TCGMSG-MPI; and (3) GA with TCGMSG. 
00074      PPIDD can be built with either of these interfaces. 
00075 
00076      (1) GA with MPI:
00077      make MPICC=mpiicc MPIFC=mpiifort INT64=y FFLAGS='-i8 -Vaxlib' INCLUDE='../../../ga-4-1-1/include /software/intel/mpi/3.1/include64' MPILIB='-L/usr/lib64 -libverbs -lm'
00078 
00079      or
00080      make CC=icc FC=ifort INT64=y FFLAGS='-i8 -Vaxlib' INCLUDE='../../../ga-4-1-1/include /software/intel/mpi/3.1/include64' \
00081      MPILIB='-I/software/intel/mpi/3.1/include64 -L/software/intel/mpi/3.1/lib64 -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker $libdir -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker \
00082      /opt/intel/mpi-rt/3.1 -lmpi -lmpiif -lmpigi -lrt -lpthread -ldl -L/usr/lib64 -libverbs -lm'
00083 
00084 
00085      (2) GA with TCGMSG-MPI:
00086      make MPICC=mpiicc MPIFC=mpiifort INT64=y FFLAGS='-i8 -Vaxlib' INCLUDE=../../../ga-4-1-1/include MPILIB='-L/usr/lib64 -libverbs -lm'
00087 
00088      or
00089      make CC=icc FC=ifort INT64=y FFLAGS='-i8 -Vaxlib' INCLUDE=../../../ga-4-1-1/include \
00090      MPILIB='-I/software/intel/mpi/3.1/include64 -L/software/intel/mpi/3.1/lib64 -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker $libdir -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker \
00091      /opt/intel/mpi-rt/3.1 -lmpi -lmpiif -lmpigi -lrt -lpthread -ldl -L/usr/lib64 -libverbs -lm'
00092 
00093      (3) GA with TCGMSG:
00094      make CC=icc FC=ifort INT64=y FFLAGS='-i8 -Vaxlib' INCLUDE=../../../ga-4-1-1/include MPILIB=../../../ga-4-1-1/lib/LINUX64/lib/
00095 
00096 
00097   </pre>
00098  *
00099  */
00100
